example: The doctor was worried about an abnormal growth on the patient's arm. (about / on)
The government decided to abolish the old tax in all regions next year. (in)
She served in the navy for five years. (in)
The mirror above the fireplace was set in an elegant oval frame. (in)
The statue was carved from a single block of marble. (from)
We waited in the airport lounge until our train arrived. (in)
The people fought for liberty from colonial rule. (for / from)
He dropped his daughter off at kindergarten before work. (off at / at)
The country is governed by a democratically elected parliament. (by)
Trust is fundamental to any healthy relationship. (to)
His main shortcoming as a leader was impatience with subordinates. (as / with)
The company issued a statement about the product recall. (about)
He bought a stout coat for the cold winter evenings. (for)
She remained stubborn in her refusal despite their arguments. (in)
The mountain is regarded as a holy place by the villagers. (as / by)
A single grain of rice fell onto the floor. (of / onto)
The team showed fierce determination in the final minutes. (in)
The law forbids discrimination against candidates on the basis of race. (against / on / of)
